channel.title: Vexpert on @PSUStevens Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Vexpert on @PSUStevens Blog

item.title: 2025 vExpert Renewal
item.description: I’m a bit late on posting this. But, better late than never. I’ve been renewed again as a VMware vExpert for 2025. This is my seventh consecutive year since I first applied. Woohoo!! 7x VMware vExpert If you haven’t met me, then you should know the image for this post is not how I look at all.
